channel.title: Homes on Home Automation project
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Home Automation project

item.title: Home
item.description: To log all the sensor data and be able to process it later, we use what we call Home. It’s written in Go and made of different configurable module. The two principal tasks are to log the sensor data in the Logger and serve it via the API Logger Source code Save sensor data and other information from the MQTT network in a database. API Source code Create a HTTP server and listen for requests.
